summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing a grant agreement in the amount of Ninety Nine Thousand Two Hundred Fifty Dollars ($99,250) with the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services, United States Department of Justice for financial assistance through the Program/Policy, Support and Evaluation (PPSE) Division to participate in the PPSE Fellowship Program; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation, and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote to the City Council.
